Brave.quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting
The fight isn't over until you win
You cannot expect victory and plan for defeat
It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not
Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
Good things come to those who wait… greater things come to those who get off their ass and do anything to make it happen.
In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
Dont be afraid to stand for what you believe in, even if that means standing alone.
I am thankful for all of those who said NO to me. Its because of them I’m doing it myself.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle.
Don’t worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don’t even try
Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
Self confidence is the most attractive quality a person can have. How can anyone see how awesome you are if you can’t see it yourself?
The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.

Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails.  Explore, Dream, Discover.

Love.quote: True love is born from understanding
Whenever you are confronted with an opponent. Conquer him with love
If in our daily life we can smile, if we can be peaceful and happy, not only we, but everyone will profit from it. This is the most basic kind of peace work
When I despair, I remember that all through history the way of truth and love have always won
Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding
Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.

Spirit.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.

Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent. To sit with a dog on a hillside on a glorious afternoon is to be back in Eden, where doing nothing was not boring--it was peace
Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one.
Don't gain the world and lose your soul, wisdom is better than silver or gold
Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
Fighting for peace is like screwing for virginity
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions
When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves
Be the change you wish to see in the world
Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for humanity
Life isn't about getting and having, it's about giving and being.
We become what we think about.
Life is about making an impact, not making in income
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
